text: So there was a great famine in Samaria. Indeed, they besieged the city so long that a donkey’s head sold for eighty shekels of silver,6:25 80 shekels is approximately 2 pounds or 907.2 grams of silver. and a quarter cab of dove’s dung 6:25 Or a quarter cab of seed pods; that is, approximately 0.28 dry quarts or 0.31 liters sold for five shekels of silver.6:25 5 shekels is approximately 2 ounces or 57 grams of silver.
